sentences.en: Despite his unprepossessing appearance, he was very popular with women.
sentences.cn: 他虽然其貌不扬，但很有女人缘。

sentences.en: He was forty - five years of age, of medium height, fairly thick - set, not at all unprepossessing.
sentences.cn: 他已经45岁, 中等身材, 矮矮胖胖的, 不完全是胸无城府的.

sentences.en: Though unprepossessing to look at, he is highly intelligent.
sentences.cn: 他虽然相貌平平，但却很有才气。
